opticoid_loop.title: Opticoid
opticoid_loop.description: Dude, watch the puns! Pretty soon, you use up all the eye-conic ones, and they just get cornea and cornea...

commands_on_entity_hit: execute as @e[distance=..4.8,nbt=!{HurtTime:0s}] run effect give @s minecraft:slowness 2 3 false

leap_unlock.title: Leap
leap_unlock.description: While §9crouching§f, launch yourself through the air and cover large distances quickly.

super_beam_unlock.title: §aSuper Eye Beam

eyeguy_sense_unlock.title: §aIncreased Awareness
eyeguy_sense_unlock.description: Obtain the ability to detect any entity nearby due to their enhanced ears.
